name: url-shortener
description: A simple URL shortener built with Node.js and Express

scripts.deploy:local: npm run build && npm run prod
scripts.deploy:docker: docker build -t url-shortener . && docker run -p 3000:3000 url-shortener
scripts.ci:test: npm run validate && npm run health-check
scripts.ci:docker: docker build -t url-shortener:ci . && docker run --rm -p 3000:3000 -d url-shortener:ci
scripts.ci:deploy: npm run ci:build && npm run ci:docker
scripts.release:prepare: npm run ci:build && npm run ci:security
scripts.release:publish: npm run release:prepare && npm run release:docker && npm run release:tag
